description: The Bear Valley Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Bear Valley for the snow report
Alexa, ask Bear Valley for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Bear Valley
shortDescription: The Bear Valley Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Bear Valley.
